Articles.Content:
I just need some ideas for stock missions!

 

 

 

 

yay
How about you send a crew to Eve, set up a base their, and try to get back? Or visit Dres and set up some asteroid mining thing?
My favorite missions are Apollo-style Munar orbit rendezvous landings.
Build a Munar or Minman space station.

Try landing on the Mun and Minmus and returning to Kerbin in one launch.

As an extra challenge, try to do it without exceeding a launch mass of say, 20 tons.

How about a challenge to build a "Cycler" between Duna and Kerbin. Cycler being a spacecraft that's in a stable orbit and regularly encounters both objects, carrying supplies and other vessels to drop off at the destination. 

Now that I think about it, I might make that challenge.....
